problem_text_cn: 如图,BD是等边△ABC的角平分线,DE⊥AB,垂足为点E,线段BC的垂直平分线交BD于点P,垂足为F,若PF=2,则DE的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, BD is the angular bisector of equilateral △ABC, DE ⊥ AB, the perpendicular bisector of the line segment BC intersects BD at point P, the perpendicular bisector is F, if PF = N_0, then the length of DE for()
raw_answer: 解:连接PC,如图所示,∠\beta=2^°∵线段BC的垂直平分线交BD于点P,∴PC=PB,∴∠CBD=∠PCB,∵BD是等边△ABC的角平分线,∴BD⊥AC,∠ABD=∠CBD=∠PCB=30°,∴∠DCP=30°,∴BP=PC=2PF=4,PD=\frac{1}{2}PC=2,∵DE⊥AB,∴DE=\frac{1}{2}BD=\frac{1}{2}(BP+PD)=3．故选:C．
